message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. After careful consideration, we believe this exceptional item would be a valuable addition to your collection. We are offering it to you at an exclusive price of $850000. This is a limited-time offer, and we encourage you to respond promptly to secure this opportunity.

Alice, your offer is tempting, but I'm looking to invest a bit less. I'd be interested in purchasing the product for $700000.  This price reflects my budget and allows for a fair profit margin for you. Please consider this offer.

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. I appreciate your feedback and understand your budget constraints. To accommodate your needs while still ensuring a fair return for us, I am pleased to counteroffer at $750000. This price reflects the value we place on the product while allowing for a reasonable profit margin. I hope this proposal meets your expectations and enables us to reach a mutually beneficial agreement.
